The final shape has the following dimensions: length 0.0571 units, width 0.75 units, and height 0.0571 units. Use "NewBodyFeatureOperation" as the boolean operation for the current part.</description>

Draw a circle centered at [0.7105, 0.0411] with a radius of 0.0141. 5. **Scale the 2D sketch:** Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. 6. **Create the 3D model:** Extrude the 2D sketch along the Z-axis by a depth of 0.0041 units in the positive direction (towards the normal).
